plot: A worker, called in a hurry to remove the snow in the city street, try to buy his remaining gifts in the tumult of Christmas eve without quitting his work.
title: La vie heureuse de Léopold Z
plot_es: A worker, called in a hurry to remove the snow in the city street, try to buy his remaining gifts in the tumult of Christmas eve without quitting his work.
original_name: La vie heureuse de Léopold Z
plot_en: A worker, called in a hurry to remove the snow in the city street, try to buy his remaining gifts in the tumult of Christmas eve without quitting his work.

produce.name: Office national du film du Canada (ONF)
